item.title: Failed Asg Event Notification
item.description: Hello! Today I want to show how with the help of AWS Lambda and Golang you can get messages in slack when Autoscaling could not create an Ec2 server. Deploy I automate using serverless. Let’s start with the installation of node and serverless. I use nvm to manage node versions. curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.37.2/install.sh | bash nvm install v14.15.3 npm install -g serverless I will create a folder and initialize the go module in it.
